title: Ticket #3434: Investigate all-CCB configuration for bugs.
description: If CCB_ADDRESS is defined for both the central manager / submit node and the execute node, everything will work up until file transfer on job start-up. While this configuration arguably shouldn't work (they don't share a private network), it may be worthwhile to take a look at why it doesn't and make sure there aren't other(?) bugs(?) lurking in there.
